text: I can’t take liberal handwringing. Chill… #MuellerReport
author: CharlesMBlow

text: I get slightly annoyed when mayors who want national office say the fed should be more like cities. They know as well as I that there are constitutional hurdles to that. Cities are different. There are no cities in the constitution. They exist under the umbrellas of states.
author: CharlesMBlow

text: . @NickKristof and I are looking for a new editorial assistant. https://nytimes.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/NYT/job/New-York-NY/Editorial-Assistant_REQ-004974-1 …
author: CharlesMBlow

author: CharlesMBlow

text: Rewatching “Gone With the Wind” for this book. Disgusted all over again. Every single appearance of a black person, speaking or not, is offensive!
author: CharlesMBlow

text: Facebook helped burn the traditional news’ business model to the ground and is now whining that there’s nothing left in the ashes. #ReapWhatYouSow
author: CharlesMBlow

text: Can’t really lock it. They have to be able to search the insides. They search my bags all the time.
author: CharlesMBlow

text: I don’t care about those underwear, but I want my things!
author: CharlesMBlow

text: No. Never heard of that.
author: CharlesMBlow

text: Heading home Tuesday. Didn’t realize that the things were missing until the temperature dropped and I needed my warmer things. Yesterday I looked for pants that I knew I’d packed. I figure that somehow I’d forgotten them, but I hadn’t. I’m a professional packer. #delta
author: CharlesMBlow

text: Been in Paris for days, and it just dawned on me that things are missing from my luggage. When I got the bag at baggage claim I realized that it was no longer expanded. Expanding it was the only way I could get it to close. I thought, “hmmm, that’s odd,” but… @DeltaAssist
author: CharlesMBlow

text: He’s an interesting man, too interesting to fully explore on Twitter. But, there was a reason he was allowed to be a delegate…
author: CharlesMBlow

text: Outnumbered? Mississippi was majority black before, during and after the Reconstruction…
author: CharlesMBlow

text: VIDEO: Before Booker T Washington’s “Atlanta Compromise” there was Isaiah Montgomery’s “Peace Bush.” (Had to trim video for Twitter. Missing beginning is about how progressive Mississippi was for black people during Reconstruction. For instance, blk voters outnumbered wht ones.)
author: CharlesMBlow

text: Every time that I think or read about American slavery it makes me white-hot mad. I’m not sure if that healthy, but it happens. And, I think about American slavery ALL THE TIME.
author: CharlesMBlow
